   19: %%
   20: -module(gen_tcp_api_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: %% Tests the documented API for the gen_tcp functions.  The "normal" cases
   23: %% are not tested here, because they are tested indirectly in this and
   24: %% and other test suites.
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   28: -include("kernel_test_lib.hrl").
   29: 
   30: -export([
   31: 	 all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   32: 	 init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   33: 	 init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, 
   34: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   35: 
   36: 	 t_connect_timeout/1, t_accept_timeout/1,
   37: 	 t_connect_src_port/1, t_connect_bad/1,
   38: 	 t_recv_timeout/1, t_recv_eof/1, t_recv_delim/1,
   39: 	 t_shutdown_write/1, t_shutdown_both/1, t_shutdown_error/1,
   40: 	 t_shutdown_async/1,
   41: 	 t_fdopen/1, t_fdconnect/1, t_implicit_inet6/1,
   42: 	 t_local_basic/1, t_local_unbound/1, t_local_fdopen/1,
   43: 	 t_local_fdopen_listen/1, t_local_fdopen_listen_unbound/1,
   44: 	 t_local_fdopen_connect/1, t_local_fdopen_connect_unbound/1,
   45: 	 t_local_abstract/1, t_accept_inet6_tclass/1,
   46: 	 s_accept_with_explicit_socket_backend/1,
   47: 
   48:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   49:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv/1,
   50:          t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1,
   51:          t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv/1
   52: 	]).
   53: 
   54: -export([getsockfd/0, closesockfd/1]).
   55: 
   56: 
   57: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   58: 
   59: suite() ->
   60:     [
   61:      {ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   62:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}
   63:     ].
   64: 
   65: all() ->
   66:     %% This is a temporary measure to ensure that we can 
   67:     %% test the socket backend without effecting *all*
   68:     %% applications on *all* machines.
   69:     %% This flag is set only for *one* host.
   70:     case ?TEST_INET_BACKENDS() of
   71:         true ->
   72:             [
   73:              {group, inet_backend_default},
   74:              {group, inet_backend_inet},
   75:              {group, inet_backend_socket},
   76:              {group, s_misc}
   77:             ];
   78:         _ ->
   79:             [
   80:              {group, inet_backend_default},
   81:              {group, s_misc}
   82:             ]
   83:     end.
   84: 
   85: groups() -> 
   86:     [
   87:      {inet_backend_default, [], inet_backend_default_cases()},
   88:      {inet_backend_inet,    [], inet_backend_inet_cases()},
   89:      {inet_backend_socket,  [], inet_backend_socket_cases()},
   90:      {t_accept,             [], t_accept_cases()},
   91:      {t_connect,            [], t_connect_cases()},
   92:      {t_recv,               [], t_recv_cases()},
   93:      {t_shutdown,           [], t_shutdown_cases()},
   94:      {t_misc,               [], t_misc_cases()},
   95:      {sockaddr,             [], sockaddr_cases()},
   96:      {t_local,              [], t_local_cases()},
   97:      {s_misc,               [], s_misc_cases()}
   98:     ].
   99: 
  100: inet_backend_default_cases() ->
  101:     [
  102:      {group, t_accept},
  103:      {group, t_connect},
  104:      {group, t_recv},
  105:      {group, t_shutdown},
  106:      {group, t_misc},
  107:      {group, t_local}
  108:     ].
  109: 
  110: inet_backend_inet_cases() ->
  111:     inet_backend_default_cases().
  112: 
  113: inet_backend_socket_cases() ->
  114:     inet_backend_default_cases().
  115: 
  116: t_accept_cases() ->
  117:     [
  118:      t_accept_timeout
  119:     ].
  120: 
  121: t_connect_cases() ->
  122:     [
  123:      t_connect_timeout,
  124:      t_connect_src_port,
  125:      t_connect_bad
  126:     ].
  127: 
  128: t_recv_cases() ->
  129:     [
  130:      t_recv_timeout,
  131:      t_recv_eof,
  132:      t_recv_delim
  133:     ].
  134: 
  135: t_shutdown_cases() ->
  136:     [
  137:      t_shutdown_write,
  138:      t_shutdown_both,
  139:      t_shutdown_error,
  140:      t_shutdown_async
  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: t_misc_cases() ->
  144:     [
  145:      t_fdopen,
  146:      t_fdconnect,
  147:      t_implicit_inet6,
  148:      t_accept_inet6_tclass,
  149:      {group, sockaddr}
  150:     ].
  151: 
  152: sockaddr_cases() ->
  153:     [
  154:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  155:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv,
  156:      t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv,
  157:      t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv
  158:     ].
  159: 
  160: t_local_cases() ->
  161:     [
  162:      t_local_basic,
  163:      t_local_unbound,
  164:      t_local_fdopen,
  165:      t_local_fdopen_listen,
  166:      t_local_fdopen_listen_unbound,
  167:      t_local_fdopen_connect,
  168:      t_local_fdopen_connect_unbound,
  169:      t_local_abstract
  170:     ].
  171: 
  172: s_misc_cases() ->
  173:     [
  174:      s_accept_with_explicit_socket_backend
  175:     ].
  176: 
  177: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  178: 
  179:     ?P("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  180:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  181:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  182: 
  183:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  184:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  185:             SKIP;
  186: 
  187:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  188: 
  189:             ?P("init_per_suite -> end when "
  190:                "~n      Config: ~p", [Config1]),
  191:             
  192:             %% We need a monitor on this node also
  193:             kernel_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  194: 
  195:             Config1
  196:     end.
  197: 
  198: 
  199: end_per_suite(Config0) ->
  200: 
  201:     ?P("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  202:        "~n      Config: ~p"
  203:        "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  204: 
  205:     %% Stop the local monitor
  206:     kernel_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  207: 
  208:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  209: 
  210:     ?P("end_per_suite -> "
  211:        "~n      Nodes: ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  212: 
  213:     Config1.
  214: 
  215: 
  216: init_per_group(inet_backend_default = _GroupName, Config) ->
  217:     [{socket_create_opts, []} | Config];
  218: init_per_group(inet_backend_inet = _GroupName, Config) ->
  219:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  220:         true ->
  221:             %% The environment trumps us,
  222:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  223:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  224:         false ->
  225:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, inet}]} | Config]
  226:     end;
  227: init_per_group(inet_backend_socket = _GroupName, Config) ->
  228:     case ?EXPLICIT_INET_BACKEND() of
  229:         true ->
  230:             %% The environment trumps us,
  231:             %% so only the default group should be run!
  232:             {skip, "explicit inet backend"};
  233:         false ->
  234:             [{socket_create_opts, [{inet_backend, socket}]} | Config]
  235:     end;
  236: init_per_group(t_local = _GroupName, Config) ->
  237:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
  238: 	true ->
  239: 	    case ?LIB:has_support_unix_domain_socket() of
  240: 		true ->
  241: 		    Config;
  242: 		false ->
  243: 		    {skip, "AF_LOCAL not supported"}
  244: 	    end;
  245: 	_ ->
  246: 	    try gen_tcp:connect({local,<<"/">>}, 0, []) of
  247: 		{error, eafnosupport} ->
  248: 		    {skip, "AF_LOCAL not supported"};
  249: 		{error,_} ->
  250: 		    Config
  251: 	    catch
  252: 		_C:_E:_S ->
  253: 		    {skip, "AF_LOCAL not supported"}
  254: 	    end
  255:     end;
  256: init_per_group(sockaddr = _GroupName, Config) ->
  257:     case is_socket_supported() of
  258:         ok ->
  259:             Config;
  260:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  261:             SKIP
  262:     end;
  263: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  264:     Config.
  265: 
  266: end_per_group(t_local, _Config) ->
  267:     delete_local_filenames();
  268: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: 
  272: init_per_testcase(Func, Config)
  273:   when Func =:= undefined -> % Insert your testcase name here
  274:     dbg:tracer(),
  275:     dbg:p(self(), c),
  276:     dbg:tpl(prim_inet, cx),
  277:     dbg:tpl(local_tcp, cx),
  278:     dbg:tpl(inet, cx),
  279:     dbg:tpl(gen_tcp, cx),
  280:     Config;
  281: init_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
  282:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  283:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  284:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  285:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  286:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  287:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  288: 
  289:     kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  290: 
  291:     ?P("init_per_testcase -> done when"
  292:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  293:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  294:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  295:     Config.
  296: 
  297: end_per_testcase(Func, _Config)
  298:   when Func =:= undefined -> % Insert your testcase name here
  299:     dbg:stop();
  300: end_per_testcase(_Func, Config) ->
  301:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  302:        "~n   Config:   ~p"
  303:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  304:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  305:        "~n   Monitors: ~p",
  306:        [Config, erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  307: 
  308:     ?P("system events during test: "
  309:        "~n   ~p", [kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  310: 
  311:     ?P("end_per_testcase -> done with"
  312:        "~n   Nodes:    ~p"
  313:        "~n   Links:    ~p"
  314:        "~n   Monitors: ~p", [erlang:nodes(), pi(links), pi(monitors)]),
  315:     ok.
  316: 
  317: %%% gen_tcp:accept/1,2
  318: 
  319: 
  320: %% Test that gen_tcp:accept/2 (with timeout) works.
  321: t_accept_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  322:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  323:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  324:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  325:                             Addr;
  326:                         {error, Reason} ->
  327:                             throw({skip, Reason})
  328:                     end
  329:            end,
  330:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeout(Config, Addr) end,
  331:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  332:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  333: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  334: 
  335: do_accept_timeout(Config, Addr) ->
  336:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}]),
  337:     timeout({gen_tcp, accept, [L, 200]}, 0.2, 1.0).
  338: 
  339: %%% gen_tcp:connect/X
  340: 
  341: 
  342: %% Test that gen_tcp:connect/4 (with timeout) works.
  343: t_connect_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  344:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  345:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  346:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  347:                             Addr;
  348:                         {error, Reason} ->
  349:                             throw({skip, Reason})
  350:                     end
  351:            end,
  352:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_connect_timeout(Config, Addr) end,
  353:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  354:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  355: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  356: 
  357: do_connect_timeout(Config, Addr)->
  358:     %%BadAddr = {134,138,177,16},
  359:     %%TcpPort = 80,
  360:     {ok, BadAddr} =  unused_ip(),
  361:     TcpPort = 45638,
  362:     ok = ?P("Connecting to ~p, port ~p", [BadAddr, TcpPort]),
  363:     connect_timeout({gen_tcp, connect,
  364: 		     [BadAddr,TcpPort,
  365: 		      ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}], 200]},
  366: 		    0.2, 5.0).
  367: 
  368: 
  369: %% Test that setting only the source port for a connection works.
  370: t_connect_src_port(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  371:     Timeout = 1000,
  372:     Loopback = {127,0,0,1},
  373:     %% Allocate a port to later use as source port
  374:     {ok, Tmp} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{ip,Loopback}, {linger,{true,0}}]),
  375:     {ok, SrcPort} = inet:port(Tmp),
  376:     io:format("SrcPort = ~w~n", [SrcPort]),
  377:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{ip,Loopback}]),
  378:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Tmp),
  379:     {ok, DstPort} = inet:port(L),
  380:     io:format("DstPort = ~w~n", [DstPort]),
  381:     ConnectOpts = [{port,SrcPort}, {linger,{true,0}}],
  382:     {ok, C} = gen_tcp:connect(Loopback, DstPort, ConnectOpts, Timeout),
  383:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
  384:     {ok, {_, SrcPort}} = inet:peername(A),
  385:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
  386:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
  387:     ok = gen_tcp:close(A).
  388: 
  389: 
  390: %% Test that gen_tcp:connect/3 handles non-existings hosts, and other
  391: %% invalid things.
  392: t_connect_bad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  393:     NonExistingPort = 45638,		% Not in use, I hope.
  394:     t_connect_bad(Config, localhost, NonExistingPort, "port not in use"),
  395:     t_connect_bad(Config, "non-existing-host-xxx", 7, "non-existing host"),
  396:     element(1, os:type()) =:= unix andalso
  397:         begin
  398:             t_connect_bad(Config, "",              7, "empty host string"),
  399:             t_connect_bad(Config, '',              7, "empty host atom")
  400:         end,
  401:     t_connect_bad(Config, ".",                     7, "root domain string"),
  402:     t_connect_bad(Config, '.',                     7, "root domain atom").
  403: 
  404: t_connect_bad(Config, Host, Port, Descr) ->
  405:     {error, Reason} =
  406:         gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port,?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config)),
  407:     io:format(
  408:       "Error for connection attempt to " ++ Descr ++ ": ~p~n",
  409:       [Reason]),
  410:     ok.
  411: 
  412: 
  413: %%% gen_tcp:recv/X
  414: 
  415: 
  416: %% Test that gen_tcp:recv/3 (with timeout works).
  417: t_recv_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  418:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  419:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  420:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  421:                             Addr;
  422:                         {error, Reason} ->
  423:                             skip(Reason)
  424:                     end
  425:            end,
  426:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_recv_timeout(Config, Addr) end,
  427:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  428:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  429: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  430: 
  431: do_recv_timeout(Config, Addr) ->
  432:     {ok, L}      = gen_tcp:listen(0,
  433: 				  ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}]),
  434:     {ok, Port}   = inet:port(L),
  435:     {ok, Client} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  436:                                    ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  437:                                        [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  438:     {ok, _A}     = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  439:     timeout({gen_tcp, recv, [Client, 0, 200]}, 0.2, 5.0).
  440: 
  441: %% Test that end of file on a socket is reported correctly.
  442: t_recv_eof(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  443:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  444:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  445:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  446:                             Addr;
  447:                         {error, Reason} ->
  448:                             skip(Reason)
  449:                     end
  450:            end,
  451:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_recv_eof(Config, Addr) end,
  452:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  453:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  454: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  455: 
  456: do_recv_eof(Config, Addr) ->
  457:     {ok, L}      = gen_tcp:listen(0,
  458: 				  ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}]),
  459:     {ok, Port}   = inet:port(L),
  460:     {ok, Client} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  461:                                    ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  462:                                        [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  463:     {ok, A}         = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  464:     ok              = gen_tcp:close(A),
  465:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0),
  466:     ok.
  467: 
  468: %% Test using message delimiter $X.
  469: t_recv_delim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  470:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  471:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  472:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  473:                             Addr;
  474:                         {error, Reason} ->
  475:                             skip(Reason)
  476:                     end
  477:            end,
  478:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_recv_delim(Config, Addr) end,
  479:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  480:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  481: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  482: 
  483: do_recv_delim(Config, Addr) ->
  484:     ?P("create listen socket"),
  485:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}]),
  486:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  487:     Opts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  488:         [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}, {packet,line}, {line_delimiter,$X}],
  489:     {ok, Client} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, Opts),
  490:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  491: 
  492:     ?P("send the data"),
  493:     ok = gen_tcp:send(A, "abcXefgX"),
  494: 
  495:     %% Why do we need a timeout?
  496:     %% Sure, normally there would be no delay,
  497:     %% but this testcase has nothing to do with timeouts?
  498:     ?P("read the first chunk"),
  499:     {ok, "abcX"} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0), % 200),
  500:     ?P("read the second chunk"),
  501:     {ok, "efgX"} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0), % 200),
  502: 
  503:     ?P("set active = 2"),
  504:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active,2}]),
  505: 
  506:     ?P("send the data again"),
  507:     ok = gen_tcp:send(A, "abcXefgX"),
  508: 
  509:     ?P("await the first chunk"),
  510:     receive {tcp, Client, "abcX"} -> ?P("received first chunk") end,
  511:     ?P("await the second chunk"),
  512:     receive {tcp, Client, "efgX"} -> ?P("received second chunk") end,
  513: 
  514:     ?P("cleanup"),
  515:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  516:     ok = gen_tcp:close(A),
  517:     ?P("done"),
  518:     ok.
  519: 
  520: %%% gen_tcp:shutdown/2
  521: 
  522: t_shutdown_write(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  523:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  524:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  525:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  526:                             Addr;
  527:                         {error, Reason} ->
  528:                             skip(Reason)
  529:                     end
  530:            end,
  531:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_shutdown_write(Config, Addr) end,
  532:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  533:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  534: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  535: 
  536: do_shutdown_write(Config, Addr) ->
  537:     ?P("create listen socket"),
  538:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  539: 				 [{ip, Addr}]),
  540:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  541:     ?P("create connect socket (C)"),
  542:     {ok, C} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  543:                               ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  544:                                   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  545:     ?P("create accept socket (A)"),
  546:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  547:     ?P("send message A -> C"),
  548:     ok = gen_tcp:send(A, "Hej Client"),
  549:     ?P("socket A shutdown(write)"),
  550:     ok = gen_tcp:shutdown(A, write),
  551:     ?P("socket C recv - expect message"),
  552:     {ok, "Hej Client"} = gen_tcp:recv(C, 0),
  553:     ?P("socket C recv - expect closed"),
  554:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(C, 0),
  555:     ?P("done"),
  556:     ok.
  557: 
  558: t_shutdown_both(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  559:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  560:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  561:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  562:                             Addr;
  563:                         {error, Reason} ->
  564:                             skip(Reason)
  565:                     end
  566:            end,
  567:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_shutdown_both(Config, Addr) end,
  568:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  569:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  570: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  571: 
  572: do_shutdown_both(Config, Addr) ->
  573:     ?P("create listen socket"),
  574:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  575: 				 [{ip, Addr}]),
  576:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  577:     ?P("create connect socket (C)"),
  578:     {ok, C} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  579:                               ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  580:                                   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  581:     ?P("create accept socket (A)"),
  582:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  583:     ?P("send message A -> C"),
  584:     ok = gen_tcp:send(A, "Hej Client"),
  585:     ?P("socket A shutdown(read_write)"),
  586:     ok = gen_tcp:shutdown(A, read_write),
  587:     ?P("socket C recv - expect message"),
  588:     {ok, "Hej Client"} = gen_tcp:recv(C, 0),
  589:     ?P("socket C recv - expect closed"),
  590:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(C, 0),
  591:     ?P("done"),
  592:     ok.
  593: 
  594: t_shutdown_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  595:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  596:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  597:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  598:                             Addr;
  599:                         {error, Reason} ->
  600:                             skip(Reason)
  601:                     end
  602:            end,
  603:     TC = fun(Addr) -> do_shutdown_error(Config, Addr) end,
  604:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  605:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  606: 	   Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  607: 
  608: do_shutdown_error(Config, Addr) ->
  609:     ?P("create listen socket"),
  610:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ip, Addr}]),
  611:     ?P("shutdown socket (with How = read_write)"),
  612:     {error, enotconn} = gen_tcp:shutdown(L, read_write),
  613:     ?P("close socket"),
  614:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
  615:     ?P("shutdown socket again (with How = read_write)"),
  616:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:shutdown(L, read_write),
  617:     ?P("done"),
  618:     ok.
  619: 
  620: t_shutdown_async(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  621:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  622:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  623:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  624:                             Addr;
  625:                         {error, Reason} ->
  626:                             skip(Reason)
  627:                     end
  628:            end,
  629:     TC = fun(Addr) -> do_shutdown_async(Config, Addr) end,
  630:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  631:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  632: 	   Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  633: 
  634: do_shutdown_async(Config, Addr) ->
  635:     ?P("create listen socket"),
  636:     {ok, L} = gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  637: 				 [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}]),
  638:     if
  639:         is_port(L) ->
  640:             do_shutdown_async2(Config, Addr, L);
  641:         true ->
  642:             (catch gen_tcp:close(L)),
  643:             exit({skip, "inet-only testcase"})
  644:     end.
  645: 
  646: do_shutdown_async2(Config, Addr, L) ->
  647:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
  648:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
  649:     ?P("connect"),
  650:     {ok, Client} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  651: 				   ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  652:                                        [{ip, Addr},
  653: 					{recbuf, 4096},
  654:                                         {active, false}]),
  655:     ?P("accept connection"),
  656:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
  657:     ?P("create payload"),
  658:     PayloadSize = 1024 * 1024,
  659:     Payload = lists:duplicate(PayloadSize, $.),
  660:     ?P("send payload"),
  661:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Payload),
  662:     ?P("verify queue size"),
  663:     case erlang:port_info(S, queue_size) of
  664: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
  665: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
  666: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail({unexpected, T})
  667:     end,
  668: 
  669:     ?P("shutdown(write) accepted socket"),
  670:     ok = gen_tcp:shutdown(S, write),
  671:     ?P("recv from connected socket"),
  672:     {ok, Buf} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
  673:     ?P("recv(0) from connected socket (expect closed)"),
  674:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0),
  675:     ?P("verify recv data"),
  676:     case length(Buf) of
  677: 	PayloadSize -> ?P("done"), ok;
  678: 	Sz -> ?P("ERROR: "
  679:                  "~n   extected: ~p"
  680:                  "~n   received: ~p", [PayloadSize, Sz]),
  681:               ct:fail({payload_size,
  682: 		       {expected, PayloadSize},
  683: 		       {received, Sz}})
  684:     end.
  685: 
  686: 
  687: %%% gen_tcp:fdopen/2
  688: 
  689: t_fdopen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  690:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  691:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
  692:                         {ok, Addr} ->
  693:                             Addr;
  694:                         {error, Reason} ->
  695:                             skip(Reason)
  696:                     end
  697:            end,
  698:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_fdopen(Config, Addr) end,
  699:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  700:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  701: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
  702: 
  703: do_fdopen(Config, Addr) ->
  704:     Question  = "Aaaa... Long time ago in a small town in Germany,",
  705:     Question1 = list_to_binary(Question),
  706:     Question2 = [<<"Aaaa">>, "... ", $L, <<>>, $o, "ng time ago ",
  707: 		 ["in ", [], <<"a small town">>, [" in Germany,", <<>>]]],
  708:     Question1 = iolist_to_binary(Question2),
  709:     Answer    = "there was a shoemaker, Schumacher was his name.",
  710:     {ok, L}      = gen_tcp:listen(0,
  711: 				  ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  712: 				      [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  713:     {ok, Port}   = inet:port(L),
  714:     {ok, Client} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port,
  715:                                    ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
  716:                                        [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
  717:     {A, FD} = case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
  718:                   {ok, ASock} when is_port(ASock) ->
  719:                       {ok, FileDesc} = prim_inet:getfd(ASock),
  720:                       {ASock, FileDesc};
  721:                   {ok, ASock} -> % socket
  722:                       {ok, [{fd, FileDesc}]} =
  723:                           gen_tcp_socket:getopts(ASock, [fd]),
  724:                       {ASock, FileDesc}
  725:               end,
  726:     ?P("fdopen -> accepted: "
  727:        "~n   A:  ~p"
  728:        "~n   FD: ~p", [A, FD]),
  729:     {ok, Server}    = try gen_tcp:fdopen(FD, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config)) of
  730: 			  {ok, _} = OK ->
  731: 			      OK;
  732: 			  {error, notsup = R} ->
  733: 			      %% This is not supported for 'socket on Windows'
  734: 			      skip({fdopen, R})
  735: 		      catch
  736: 			  throw:{error, notsup = R} ->
  737: 			      %% This is not supported for 'socket on Windows'
  738: 			      skip({fdopen, R})
  739: 		      end,
  740:     ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question),
  741:     {ok, Question}  = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  742:     ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question1),
  743:     {ok, Question}  = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  744:     ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question2),
  745:     {ok, Question}  = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  746:     ok              = gen_tcp:send(Server, Answer),
  747:     {ok, Answer}    = gen_tcp:recv(Client, length(Answer), 2000),
  748:     ok              = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  749:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(A, 1, 2000),
  750:     ok              = gen_tcp:close(Server),
  751:     ok              = gen_tcp:close(A),
  752:     ok              = gen_tcp:close(L),
  753:     ok.
  754: 
  755: 
  756: t_fdconnect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  757:     Cond = fun() ->
  758:                    ?P("Try verify if IPv4 is supported"),
  759:                    ?HAS_SUPPORT_IPV4()
  760:            end,
  761:     Pre  = fun() ->
  762:                    {ok, Addr} = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
  763:                    ?P("Use (local) address: ~p", [Addr]),
  764:                    #{local_addr => Addr}
  765:            end,
  766:     Case = fun(#{local_addr := Addr}) ->
  767:                    do_t_fdconnect(Addr, Config)
  768:            end,
  769:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  770:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
  771:             Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  772: 
  773: do_t_fdconnect(Addr, Config) ->
  774:     Question  = "Aaaa... Long time ago in a small town in Germany,",
  775:     Question1 = list_to_binary(Question),
  776:     Question2 = [<<"Aaaa">>, "... ", $L, <<>>, $o, "ng time ago ",
  777: 		 ["in ", [], <<"a small town">>, [" in Germany,", <<>>]]],
  778:     Question1 = iolist_to_binary(Question2),
  779:     Answer    = "there was a shoemaker, Schumacher was his name.",
  780:     Path      = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  781:     Lib       = "gen_tcp_api_SUITE",
  782:     ?P("try load util nif lib"),
  783:     case erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path, Lib), []) of
  784:         ok ->
  785:             ok;
  786:         {error, {reload, ReasonStr}} ->
  787:             ?P("already loaded: "
  788:                "~n   ~s", [ReasonStr]),
  789:             ok;
  790:         {error, Reason} ->
  791:             ?P("UNEXPECTED - failed loading util nif lib: "
  792:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
  793:             ?SKIPT("failed loading util nif lib")
  794:     end,
  795:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
  796:     LOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{ifaddr, Addr}, {active, false}],
  797:     L = try gen_tcp:listen(0, LOpts) of
  798:             {ok, LSock} ->
  799:                 LSock;
  800:             {error, eaddrnotavail = LReason} ->
  801:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason));
  802:             {error, LReason} ->
  803:                 ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - listen error: "
  804:                    "~n      COpts:  ~p"
  805:                    "~n      Reason: ~p", [LReason]),
  806:                 ct:fail({unexpected_listen_error, LReason, LOpts})
  807:         catch
  808:             LC : LE : LS ->
  809:                 ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - caught listen: "
  810:                    "~n   LOpts: ~p"
  811:                    "~n   C:     ~p"
  812:                    "~n   E:     ~p"
  813:                    "~n   S:     ~p", [LOpts, LC, LE, LS]),
  814:                 ct:fail({listen_failure, {LC, LE, LS}, LOpts})
  815:         end,            
  816:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(L),
  817:     ?P("try create file descriptor"),
  818:     FD = gen_tcp_api_SUITE:getsockfd(),
  819:     ?P("try connect (to port ~w) using file descriptor ~w", [LPort, FD]),
  820:     COpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [{fd,     FD},
  821:                                            {ifaddr, Addr},
  822:                                            {active, false}],
  823:     %% The debug is just to "see" that it (debug) "works"...
  824:     Client = try gen_tcp:connect(Addr, LPort, COpts ++ [{debug, true}]) of
  825:                  {ok, CSock} ->
  826:                      ok = inet:setopts(CSock, [{debug, false}]),
  827:                      CSock;
  828:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
  829:                      gen_tcp:close(L),
  830:                      gen_tcp_api_SUITE:closesockfd(FD),
  831:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason));
  832:                  {error, CReason} ->
  833:                      ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - connect error: "
  834:                         "~n      COpts:  ~p"
  835:                         "~n      Reason: ~p", [COpts, CReason]),
  836:                      ct:fail({unexpected_connect_error, CReason, COpts})
  837:              catch
  838:                  CC : CE : CS ->
  839:                      ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - caught connect: "
  840:                         "~n   COpts: ~p"
  841:                         "~n   C:     ~p"
  842:                         "~n   E:     ~p"
  843:                         "~n   S:     ~p", [COpts, CC, CE, CS]),
  844:                      ct:fail({connect_failure, {CC, CE, CS}, COpts})
  845:              end,                             
  846:     ?P("try accept connection"),
  847:     Server = try gen_tcp:accept(L) of
  848:                  {ok, ASock} ->
  849:                      ASock;
  850:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = AReason} ->
  851:                      gen_tcp:close(Client),
  852:                      gen_tcp:close(L),
  853:                      gen_tcp_api_SUITE:closesockfd(FD),
  854:                      ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason));
  855:                  {error, AReason} ->
  856:                      ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - accept error: "
  857:                         "~n      Reason: ~p", [AReason]),
  858:                      ct:fail({unexpected_accept_error, AReason})
  859:              catch
  860:                  AC : AE : AS ->
  861:                      ?P("UNEXPECTED ERROR - caught accept: "
  862:                         "~n   C: ~p"
  863:                         "~n   E: ~p"
  864:                         "~n   S: ~p", [AC, AE, AS]),
  865:                      ct:fail({accept_failure, {AC, AE, AS}})
  866:         end,                             
  867:     ?P("begin validation"),
  868:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question),
  869:     {ok, Question} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  870:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question1),
  871:     {ok, Question} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  872:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, Question2),
  873:     {ok, Question} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, length(Question), 2000),
  874:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, Answer),
  875:     {ok, Answer} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, length(Answer), 2000),
  876:     ?P("cleanup"),
  877:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
  878:     FD = gen_tcp_api_SUITE:closesockfd(FD),
  879:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, 1, 2000),
  880:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
  881:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
  882:     ?P("done"),
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: 
  886: %%% implicit inet6 option to api functions
  887: 
  888: t_implicit_inet6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  889:     ?TC_TRY(t_implicit_inet6, fun() -> do_t_implicit_inet6(Config) end).
  890: 
  891: do_t_implicit_inet6(Config) ->
  892:     ?P("try get hostname"),
  893:     Host = ok(inet:gethostname()),
  894:     ?P("try get address for host ~p", [Host]),
  895:     case inet:getaddr(Host, inet6) of
  896: 	{ok, Addr} ->
  897:             ?P("address: ~p", [Addr]),
  898: 	    t_implicit_inet6(Config, Host, Addr);
  899: 	{error, Reason} ->
  900: 	    {skip,
  901: 	     "Can not look up IPv6 address: "
  902: 	     ++atom_to_list(Reason)}
  903:     end.
  904: 
  905: t_implicit_inet6(Config, Host, Addr) ->
  906:     Loopback = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
  907:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
  908:     case gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ [inet6, {ip,Loopback}]) of
  909: 	{ok, S1} ->
  910: 	    ?P("try ~s ~p", ["::1", Loopback]),
  911: 	    implicit_inet6(Config, S1, Loopback),
  912: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
  913: 	    %%
  914: 	    LocalAddr = ok(get_localaddr()),
  915: 	    S2 = case gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{ip, LocalAddr}]) of
  916:                      {ok, LSock2} ->
  917:                          LSock2;
  918:                      {error, Reason2} ->
  919:                          ?P("Listen failed (ip):"
  920:                             "~n   Reason2: ~p", [Reason2]),
  921:                          ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason2))
  922:                  end,
  923: 	    implicit_inet6(Config, S2, LocalAddr),
  924: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
  925: 	    %%
  926: 	    ?P("try ~s ~p", [Host, Addr]),
  927: 	    S3 = case gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,Addr}]) of
  928:                      {ok, LSock3} ->
  929:                          LSock3;
  930:                      {error, Reason3} ->
  931:                          ?P("Listen failed (ifaddr):"
  932:                             "~n   Reason3: ~p", [Reason3]),
  933:                          ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason3))
  934:                  end,
  935: 	    implicit_inet6(Config, S3, Addr),
  936: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
  937: 	    ?P("done"),
  938:             ok;
  939:         {error, Reason1} ->
  940:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason1))
  941:     end.
  942: 
  943: implicit_inet6(Config, S, Addr) ->
  944:     P = ok(inet:port(S)),
  945:     S2 = case gen_tcp:connect(Addr, P, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config)) of
  946:              {ok, CSock} ->
  947:                  CSock;
  948:              {error, CReason} ->
  949:                  ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
  950:          end,
  951:     P2 = ok(inet:port(S2)),
  952:     S1 = case gen_tcp:accept(S) of
  953:              {ok, ASock} ->
  954:                  ASock;
  955:              {error, AReason} ->
  956:                  ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason))
  957:          end,
  958:     P1 = P = ok(inet:port(S1)),
  959:     {Addr,P2} = ok(inet:peername(S1)),
  960:     {Addr,P1} = ok(inet:peername(S2)),
  961:     {Addr,P1} = ok(inet:sockname(S1)),
  962:     {Addr,P2} = ok(inet:sockname(S2)),
  963:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
  964:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1).
  965: 
  966: 
  967: t_local_basic(Config) ->
  968:     SFile = local_filename(server),
  969:     SAddr = {local, bin_filename(SFile)},
  970:     CFile = local_filename(client),
  971:     CAddr = {local,bin_filename(CFile)},
  972:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
  973:     _ = file:delete(CFile),
  974:     %%
  975:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
  976:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
  977:     L =
  978: 	ok(
  979: 	  gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ 
  980:                              [{ifaddr,{local,SFile}},{active,false}])),
  981:     ?P("try connect"),
  982:     C =
  983: 	ok(
  984: 	  gen_tcp:connect(
  985: 	    {local,SFile}, 0, InetBackendOpts ++
  986:                 [{ifaddr,{local,CFile}},{active,false}])),
  987:     ?P("try accept connection"),
  988:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
  989:     ?P("try get sockname for listen socket"),
  990:     %% SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
  991:     case inet:sockname(L) of
  992:         {ok, SAddr} ->
  993:             ok;
  994:         {ok, SAddr2} ->
  995:             ?P("Invalid sockname: "
  996:                "~n   Expected: ~p"
  997:                "~n   Actual:   ~p", [SAddr, SAddr2]),
  998:             exit({sockename, SAddr, SAddr2});
  999:         {error, Reason} ->
 1000:             exit({sockname, Reason})
 1001:     end,
 1002:     ?P("try get peername for listen socket"),
 1003:     {error, enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1004:     ?P("try handshake"),
 1005:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, CAddr),
 1006:     ?P("try close listen socket"),
 1007:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1008:     ?P("try close accept socket"),
 1009:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1010:     ?P("try close connect socket"),
 1011:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1012:     %%
 1013:     ?P("try 'local' files"),
 1014:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1015:     ok = file:delete(CFile),
 1016:     ?P("done"),
 1017:     ok.
 1018: 
 1019: 
 1020: t_local_unbound(Config) ->
 1021:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1022: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1023: 	    fun() -> do_local_unbound(Config) end).
 1024: 
 1025: do_local_unbound(Config) ->
 1026:     ?P("create local (server) filename"),
 1027:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1028:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1029:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1030:     %%
 1031:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1032:     ?P("create listen socket with ifaddr ~p", [SAddr]),
 1033:     L = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++
 1034:                               [{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}])),
 1035:     ?P("listen socket created: ~p"
 1036:        "~n   => try connect", [L]),
 1037:     C = ok(gen_tcp:connect(SAddr, 0,
 1038:                            InetBackendOpts ++ [{active,false}])),
 1039:     ?P("connected: ~p"
 1040:        "~n   => try accept", [C]),
 1041:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1042:     ?P("accepted: ~p"
 1043:        "~n   => sockname", [S]),
 1044:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1045:     ?P("sockname: ~p"
 1046:        "~n   => peername (expect enotconn)", [SAddr]),
 1047:     {error, enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1048:     ?P("try local handshake"),
 1049:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, {local,<<>>}),
 1050:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 1051:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1052:     ?P("close accepted socket"),
 1053:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1054:     ?P("close connected socket"),
 1055:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1056:     ?P("delete (local) file"),
 1057:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1058:     ?P("done"),
 1059:     ok.
 1060: 
 1061: 
 1062: t_local_fdopen(Config) ->
 1063:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1064: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1065: 	    fun() -> do_local_fdopen(Config) end).
 1066: 
 1067: do_local_fdopen(Config) ->
 1068:     ?P("create local (server) filename"),
 1069:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1070:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1071:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1072:     %%
 1073:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1074:     ListenOpts = InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}],
 1075:     ?P("create listen socket with ListenOpts ~p", [ListenOpts]),
 1076:     L = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, ListenOpts)),
 1077:     ConnectOpts = InetBackendOpts ++ [{active,false}],
 1078:     ?P("listen socket created: ~p"
 1079:        "~n   => try connect ~p", [L, ConnectOpts]),
 1080:     C0 = ok(gen_tcp:connect(SAddr, 0, ConnectOpts)),
 1081:     ok = inet:setopts(C0, [{debug, true}]),
 1082:     ?P("connected: ~p"
 1083:        "~n   => get fd", [C0]),
 1084:     Fd = if
 1085:              is_port(C0) ->
 1086:                  FD0 = ok(prim_inet:getfd(C0)),
 1087:                  ?P("FD: ~p"
 1088:                     "~n   => ignore fd", [FD0]),
 1089:                  %% Turn off C0, so it does not generate any events!
 1090:                  ok = prim_inet:ignorefd(C0, true),
 1091:                  FD0;
 1092:              true ->
 1093:                  [{fd, FD0}] = ok(inet:getopts(C0, [fd])),
 1094:                  ?P("FD: ~p", [FD0]),
 1095:                  FD0
 1096:          end,
 1097:     ?P("ignored fd:"
 1098:        "~n   => try fdopen (local)"),
 1099:     C = ok(gen_tcp:fdopen(Fd, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++ [local])),
 1100:     ?P("fd open: ~p"
 1101:        "~n   => try accept", [C]),
 1102:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1103:     ?P("accepted: ~p"
 1104:        "~n   => get sockname", [S]),
 1105:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1106:     ?P("sockname: ~p"
 1107:        "~n   => try get peername (expect enotconn)", [SAddr]),
 1108:     {error,enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1109:     ?P("try local handshake"),
 1110:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, {local,<<>>}),
 1111:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 1112:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1113:     ?P("close accepted socket"),
 1114:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1115:     ?P("close connected socket (final)"),
 1116:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1117:     ?P("close connected socket (pre)"),
 1118:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C0),
 1119:     ?P("delete (local) file"),
 1120:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1121:     ?P("done"),
 1122:     ok.
 1123: 
 1124: t_local_fdopen_listen(Config) ->
 1125:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1126: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1127: 	    fun() -> do_local_fdopen_listen(Config) end).
 1128: 
 1129: do_local_fdopen_listen(Config) ->
 1130:     ?P("create local (server) filename"),
 1131:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1132:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1133:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1134:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1135:     ?P("create dummy listen socket with ifaddr ~p", [SAddr]),
 1136:     L0 = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++
 1137:                                [{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}])),
 1138:     ?P("dummy listen socket created: ~p"
 1139:        "~n   => try get FD", [L0]),
 1140:     Fd = if
 1141:              is_port(L0) ->
 1142:                  ok(prim_inet:getfd(L0));
 1143:              true ->
 1144:                  [{fd, FD0}] = ok(inet:getopts(L0, [fd])),
 1145:                  FD0
 1146:          end,
 1147:     ?P("FD: ~p"
 1148:        "~n   => try create proper listen socket (using fd)", [Fd]),
 1149:     L = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++
 1150:                               [{fd,Fd},local,{active,false}])),
 1151:     ?P("try connect"),
 1152:     C = ok(gen_tcp:connect(SAddr, 0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{active,false}])),
 1153:     ?P("try accept (connection)"),
 1154:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1155:     ?P("verify (proper) listen socket sockname"),
 1156:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1157:     ?P("verify (proper) listen socket peername (expect enotconn)"),
 1158:     {error, enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1159:     ?P("perform handshake"),
 1160:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, {local,<<>>}),
 1161:     ?P("close (proper) listen socket"),
 1162:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1163:     ?P("close (dummy) listen socket"),
 1164:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L0),
 1165:     ?P("close accepted socket"),
 1166:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1167:     ?P("close connected socket"),
 1168:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1169:     ?P("delete file (used for socket)"),
 1170:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1171:     ?P("done"),
 1172:     ok.
 1173: 
 1174: t_local_fdopen_listen_unbound(Config) ->
 1175:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1176: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1177: 	    fun() -> do_local_fdopen_listen_unbound(Config) end).
 1178: 
 1179: do_local_fdopen_listen_unbound(Config) ->
 1180:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1181:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1182:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1183:     P = ok(prim_inet:open(tcp, local, stream)),
 1184:     Fd = ok(prim_inet:getfd(P)),
 1185:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1186:     L =
 1187: 	ok(gen_tcp:listen(
 1188: 	     0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{fd,Fd},{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}])),
 1189:     C = ok(gen_tcp:connect(SAddr, 0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{active,false}])),
 1190:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1191:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1192:     {error,enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1193:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, {local,<<>>}),
 1194:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1195:     ok = gen_tcp:close(P),
 1196:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1197:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1198:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1199:     ok.
 1200: 
 1201: t_local_fdopen_connect(Config) ->
 1202:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1203: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1204: 	    fun() -> do_local_fdopen_connect(Config) end).
 1205: 
 1206: do_local_fdopen_connect(Config) ->
 1207:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1208:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1209:     CFile = local_filename(client),
 1210:     CAddr = {local,bin_filename(CFile)},
 1211:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1212:     _ = file:delete(CFile),
 1213:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1214:     L = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}])),
 1215:     P = ok(prim_inet:open(tcp, local, stream)),
 1216:     Fd = ok(prim_inet:getfd(P)),
 1217:     C =
 1218: 	ok(gen_tcp:connect(
 1219: 	     SAddr, 0, InetBackendOpts ++
 1220:                  [{fd,Fd},{ifaddr,CAddr},{active,false}])),
 1221:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1222:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1223:     {error,enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1224:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, CAddr),
 1225:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1226:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1227:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1228:     ok = gen_tcp:close(P),
 1229:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1230:     ok.
 1231: 
 1232: t_local_fdopen_connect_unbound(Config) ->
 1233:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1234: 	    fun() -> is_not_windows() end,
 1235: 	    fun() -> do_local_fdopen_connect_unbound(Config) end).
 1236: 
 1237: do_local_fdopen_connect_unbound(Config) ->
 1238:     SFile = local_filename(server),
 1239:     SAddr = {local,bin_filename(SFile)},
 1240:     _ = file:delete(SFile),
 1241:     InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1242:     L = ok(gen_tcp:listen(0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,SAddr},{active,false}])),
 1243:     P = ok(prim_inet:open(tcp, local, stream)),
 1244:     Fd = ok(prim_inet:getfd(P)),
 1245:     C =	ok(gen_tcp:connect(SAddr, 0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{fd,Fd},{active,false}])),
 1246:     S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1247:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1248:     {error,enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1249:     local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, {local,<<>>}),
 1250:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1251:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1252:     ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1253:     ok = gen_tcp:close(P),
 1254:     ok = file:delete(SFile),
 1255:     ok.
 1256: 
 1257: t_local_abstract(Config) ->
 1258:     ?TC_TRY(t_local_abstract, fun() -> do_local_abstract(Config) end).
 1259: 
 1260: do_local_abstract(Config) ->
 1261:     ?P("only run on linux"),
 1262:     case os:type() of
 1263: 	{unix, linux} ->
 1264: 	    AbstAddr = {local,<<>>},
 1265:             InetBackendOpts = ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config),
 1266:             ?P("create listen socket"),
 1267: 	    L =
 1268: 		ok(gen_tcp:listen(
 1269: 		     0, InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,AbstAddr},{active,false}])),
 1270:             ?P("listen socket created: ~p"
 1271:                "~n      => sockname", [L]),
 1272: 	    {local, _} = SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(L)),
 1273:             ?P("(listen socket) sockname verified"
 1274:                "~n      => try connect"),
 1275: 	    C =
 1276: 		ok(gen_tcp:connect(
 1277: 		     SAddr, 0,
 1278:                      InetBackendOpts ++ [{ifaddr,AbstAddr},{active,false}])),
 1279:             ?P("connected: ~p"
 1280:                "~n      => sockname", [C]),
 1281: 	    {local,_} = CAddr = ok(inet:sockname(C)),
 1282:             ?P("(connected socket) sockname verified"
 1283:                "~n      => try accept"),
 1284: 	    S = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1285:             ?P("accepted: ~p"
 1286:                "~n   => peername (expect enotconn)", [S]),
 1287: 	    {error,enotconn} = inet:peername(L),
 1288:             ?P("try local handshake"),
 1289: 	    local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, CAddr),
 1290:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 1291: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1292:             ?P("close accepted socket"),
 1293: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 1294:             ?P("close connected socket"),
 1295: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(C),
 1296:             ?P("done"),
 1297: 	    ok;
 1298: 	_ ->
 1299:             ?P("skip (unless linux)"),
 1300: 	    {skip,"AF_LOCAL Abstract Addresses only supported on Linux"}
 1301:     end.
 1302: 
 1303: 
 1304: local_handshake(S, SAddr, C, CAddr) ->
 1305:     ?P("~w -> entry with"
 1306:        "~n   Server Sock:          ~p"
 1307:        "~n   Server Sock Info:     ~p"
 1308:        "~n   Server Addr:          ~p"
 1309:        "~n   Client Sock:          ~p"
 1310:        "~n   Client Sock Info:     ~p"
 1311:        "~n   Client Addr:          ~p"
 1312:        "~n", [?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1313: 	      S, inet:info(S), SAddr,
 1314: 	      C, inet:info(C), CAddr]),
 1315:     SData = "9876543210",
 1316:     CData = "0123456789",
 1317:     ?P("~w -> verify server sockname", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1318:     SAddr = ok(inet:sockname(S)),
 1319:     ?P("~w -> verify client sockname", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1320:     CAddr = ok(inet:sockname(C)),
 1321:     ?P("~w -> verify server peername", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1322:     CAddr = ok(inet:peername(S)),
 1323:     ?P("~w -> verify client peername", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1324:     SAddr = ok(inet:peername(C)),
 1325:     ?P("~w -> send data on client socket", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1326:     ok = gen_tcp:send(C, CData),
 1327:     ?P("~w -> send data on server socket", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1328:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, SData),
 1329:     ?P("~w -> recv data on server socket", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1330:     CData = ok(gen_tcp:recv(S, length(CData))),
 1331:     ?P("~w -> recv data on client socket", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1332:     SData = ok(gen_tcp:recv(C, length(SData))),
 1333:     ?P("~w -> done", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 1334:     ok.
 1335: 
 1336: t_accept_inet6_tclass(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1337:     ?TC_TRY(t_accept_inet6_tclass, fun() -> do_accept_inet6_tclass(Config) end).
 1338: 
 1339: do_accept_inet6_tclass(Config) ->
 1340:     TClassOpt = {tclass, 8#56 bsl 2}, % Expedited forwarding
 1341:     Loopback  = {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1},
 1342:     ?P("create listen socket with tclass: ~p", [TClassOpt]),
 1343:     case gen_tcp:listen(0, ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config) ++
 1344:                             [inet6, {ip, Loopback}, TClassOpt]) of
 1345: 	{ok, L} ->
 1346:             ?P("listen socket created: "
 1347:                "~n      ~p", [L]),
 1348: 	    LPort = ok(inet:port(L)),
 1349:             ?P("try to connect to port ~p", [LPort]),
 1350: 	    Sa = ok(gen_tcp:connect(Loopback, LPort,
 1351:                                     ?INET_BACKEND_OPTS(Config))),
 1352:             ?P("connected: ~p"
 1353:                "~n   => accept connection", [Sa]),
 1354: 	    Sb = ok(gen_tcp:accept(L)),
 1355:             ?P("accepted: ~p"
 1356:                "~n   => getopts (tclass)", [Sb]),
 1357: 	    [TClassOpt] = ok(inet:getopts(Sb, [tclass])),
 1358:             ?P("tclass verified => close accepted socket"),
 1359: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Sb),
 1360:             ?P("close connected socket"),
 1361: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Sa),
 1362:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 1363: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 1364:             ?P("done"),
 1365: 	    ok;
 1366: 	{error, _Reason} ->
 1367:             ?P("ERROR: Failed create listen socket"
 1368:                "~n   ~p", [_Reason]),
 1369: 	    {skip,"IPv6 TCLASS not supported"}
 1370:     end.
 1371: 
 1372: 
 1373: %% Here we use socket:sockaddr_in6() when creating and using the
 1374: %% socket(s).
 1375: %%
 1376: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1377:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1378:             fun() -> ?LIB:has_support_ipv6() end,
 1379:             fun() ->
 1380:                     Domain = inet6,
 1381:                     {ok, LocalAddr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain),
 1382:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 1383:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 1384:                                  port     => 0},
 1385:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 1386:             end).
 1387: 
 1388: 
 1389: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in6_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1390:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1391:             fun() ->
 1392:                     ?LIB:has_support_ipv6(),
 1393:                     is_net_supported()
 1394:             end,
 1395:             fun() ->
 1396:                     Domain = inet6,
 1397:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 1398:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 1399:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 1400:                                 LLA;
 1401:                             {error, _} ->
 1402:                                 skip("No link local address")
 1403:                         end,
 1404:                     Filter =
 1405:                         fun(#{addr := #{family := D,
 1406:                                         addr   := A}}) ->
 1407:                                 (D =:= Domain) andalso (A =:= LinkLocalAddr);
 1408:                            (_) ->
 1409:                                 false
 1410:                         end,
 1411:                     case net:getifaddrs(Filter) of
 1412:                         {ok, [#{addr := #{scope_id := ScopeID}}|_]} ->
 1413:                             SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 1414:                                          addr     => LinkLocalAddr,
 1415:                                          port     => 0,
 1416:                                          scope_id => ScopeID},
 1417:                             do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config);
 1418:                         {ok, _} ->
 1419:                             skip("Scope ID not found");
 1420:                         {error, R} ->
 1421:                             skip({failed_getifaddrs, R})
 1422:                     end
 1423:             end).
 1424: 
 1425: 
 1426: %% Here we use socket:sockaddr_in() when creating and using the
 1427: %% socket(s).
 1428: %%
 1429: t_simple_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1430:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1431:             fun() -> ok end,
 1432:             fun() ->
 1433:                     Domain = inet,
 1434:                     {ok, LocalAddr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(Domain),
 1435:                     SockAddr = #{family   => Domain,
 1436:                                  addr     => LocalAddr,
 1437:                                  port     => 0},
 1438:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 1439:             end).
 1440: 
 1441: 
 1442: t_simple_link_local_sockaddr_in_send_recv(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1443:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1444:             fun() -> ok end,
 1445:             fun() ->
 1446:                     Domain = inet,
 1447:                     LinkLocalAddr =
 1448:                         case ?LIB:which_link_local_addr(Domain) of
 1449:                             {ok, LLA} ->
 1450:                                 LLA;
 1451:                             {error, _} ->
 1452:                                 skip("No link local address")
 1453:                         end,
 1454:                     SockAddr = #{family => Domain,
 1455:                                  addr   => LinkLocalAddr,
 1456:                                  port   => 0},
 1457:                     do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, Config)
 1458:             end).
 1459: 
 1460: 
 1461: do_simple_sockaddr_send_recv(SockAddr, _) ->
 1462:     %% Create the server
 1463:     Self   = self(),
 1464:     ?P("~n      SockAddr: ~p", [SockAddr]),
 1465:     ServerF = fun() ->
 1466:                       ?P("try create listen socket"),
 1467:                       LSock =
 1468:                           try gen_tcp:listen(0, [{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 1469:                                                  {active, true},
 1470:                                                  binary]) of
 1471:                               {ok, LS} ->
 1472:                                   LS;
 1473:                               {error, LReason} ->
 1474:                                   ?P("listen error: "
 1475:                                      "~n      Reason: ~p", [LReason]),
 1476:                                   exit({listen_error, LReason})
 1477:                           catch
 1478:                               LC:LE:LS ->
 1479:                                   ?P("listen failure: "
 1480:                                      "~n      Error Class: ~p"
 1481:                                      "~n      Error:       ~p"
 1482:                                      "~n      Call Stack:  ~p", [LC, LE, LS]),
 1483:                                   exit({listen_failure, {LC, LE, LS}})
 1484:                           end,
 1485:                       ?P("try get listen port"),
 1486:                       {ok, Port}  = inet:port(LSock),
 1487:                       ?P("listen port: ~w", [Port]),
 1488:                       Self ! {{port, Port}, self()},
 1489:                       ?P("try accept"),
 1490:                       {ok, ASock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 1491:                       ?P("accepted: "
 1492:                          "~n      ~p", [ASock]),
 1493:                       receive
 1494:                           {tcp, ASock, <<"hej">>} ->
 1495:                               ?P("received expected message - send reply"),
 1496:                               ok = gen_tcp:send(ASock, "hopp")
 1497:                       end,
 1498:                       ?P("await termination command"),
 1499:                       receive
 1500:                           {die, Self} ->
 1501:                               ?P("terminating"),
 1502:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(ASock)),
 1503:                               (catch gen_tcp:close(LSock)),
 1504:                               exit(normal)
 1505:                       end
 1506:               end,
 1507:     ?P("try start server"),
 1508:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 1509:     ?P("server started - await port "),
 1510:     ServerPort = receive
 1511:                      {{port, Port}, Server} ->
 1512:                          Port;
 1513:                      {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 1514:                          ?P("server died unexpectedly: "
 1515:                             "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 1516:                          exit({unexpected_listen_failure, Reason})
 1517:                  end,
 1518:     ?P("server port received: ~p", [ServerPort]),
 1519:     
 1520:     ?P("try connect to server"),
 1521:     ServerSockAddr = SockAddr#{port => ServerPort},
 1522:     {ok, CSock} = gen_tcp:connect(ServerSockAddr,
 1523:                                   [{ifaddr, SockAddr},
 1524:                                    {active, true},
 1525:                                    binary]),
 1526:     ?P("connected to server: "
 1527:        "~n      CSock: ~p"
 1528:        "~n      CPort: ~p", [CSock, inet:port(CSock)]),
 1529: 
 1530:     ?P("try send message"),
 1531:     ok = gen_tcp:send(CSock, "hej"),
 1532:     
 1533:     ?P("await reply message"),
 1534:     receive
 1535:         {tcp, CSock, <<"hopp">>} ->
 1536:             ?P("received expected reply message")
 1537:     end,
 1538: 
 1539:     ?P("terminate server"),
 1540:     Server ! {die, self()},
 1541: 
 1542:     ?P("await server termination"),
 1543:     receive
 1544:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 1545:             ok
 1546:     end,
 1547:     
 1548:     ?P("cleanup"),
 1549:     (catch gen_tcp:close(CSock)),
 1550: 
 1551:     ?P("done"),
 1552:     ok.
 1553: 
 1554:     
 1555: %% On MacOS (maybe more), accepting a connection resulted in a crash.
 1556: %% Note that since 'socket' currently does not work on windows
 1557: %% we have to skip on that platform.
 1558: s_accept_with_explicit_socket_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1559:     Cond = fun() ->
 1560: 		   is_socket_supported()
 1561: 	   end,
 1562:     Pre  = fun() ->
 1563: 		   case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 1564:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 1565:                             Addr;
 1566: 		       {error, Reason} ->
 1567: 			   skip(Reason)
 1568:                     end
 1569: 	   end,
 1570:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_s_accept_with_explicit_socket_backend(Addr) end,
 1571:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 1572:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME,
 1573: 	    Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 1574: 
 1575: do_s_accept_with_explicit_socket_backend(Addr) ->
 1576:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 1577:     {ok, S}         = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{inet_backend, socket}, {ip, Addr}]),
 1578:     ?P("try get port number (via sockname)"),
 1579:     {ok, {_, Port}} = inet:sockname(S),
 1580:     ClientF = fun() ->
 1581:                       ?P("[client] try connect (tp ~p)", [Port]),
 1582: 		      {ok, _} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr}]),
 1583:                       ?P("[client] connected - wait for termination command"),
 1584: 		      receive
 1585:                           die ->
 1586:                               ?P("[client] termination command received"),
 1587:                               exit(normal)
 1588:                       after infinity -> ok
 1589:                       end
 1590: 	      end,
 1591:     ?P("create client"),
 1592:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 1593:     ?P("try accept"),
 1594:     {ok, _} = gen_tcp:accept(S),
 1595:     ?P("accepted - command client to terminate"),
 1596:     Client ! die,
 1597:     ?P("done"),
 1598:     ok.
 1599: 
 1600: 
 1601: %%% Utilities
 1602: 
 1603: is_socket_supported() ->
 1604:     try socket:info() of
 1605:         _ -> ok
 1606:     catch
 1607:         error : notsup ->
 1608:             {skip, "esock not supported"};
 1609:         error : undef ->
 1610:             {skip, "esock not configured"}
 1611:     end.
 1612: 
 1613: 
 1614: %% Calls M:F/length(A), which should return a timeout error, and complete
 1615: %% within the given time.
 1616: 
 1617: timeout({M,F,A}, Lower, Upper) ->
 1618:     case test_server:timecall(M, F, A) of
 1619: 	{Time, Result} when Time < Lower ->
 1620: 	    ct:fail({too_short_time, Time, Result});
 1621: 	{Time, Result} when Time > Upper ->
 1622: 	    ct:fail({too_long_time, Time, Result});
 1623: 	{_, {error, timeout}} ->
 1624: 	    ok;
 1625: 	{_, Result} ->
 1626: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_result, Result})
 1627:     end.
 1628: 
 1629: connect_timeout({M,F,A}, Lower, Upper) ->
 1630:     case test_server:timecall(M, F, A) of
 1631: 	{Time, Result} when Time < Lower ->
 1632: 	    case Result of
 1633: 		{error, econnrefused = E} ->
 1634: 		    {skip, "Not tested -- got error " ++ atom_to_list(E)};
 1635: 		{error, enetunreach = E} ->
 1636: 		    {skip, "Not tested -- got error " ++ atom_to_list(E)};
 1637:                 {error, ehostunreach = E} ->
 1638: 		    {skip, "Not tested -- got error " ++ atom_to_list(E)};
 1639: 		{ok, Socket} -> % What the...
 1640: 		    Pinfo = erlang:port_info(Socket),
 1641: 		    Db = inet_db:lookup_socket(Socket),
 1642: 		    Peer = inet:peername(Socket),
 1643: 		    ct:fail({too_short_time, Time,
 1644: 			     [Result,Pinfo,Db,Peer]});
 1645: 		_ ->
 1646: 		    ct:fail({too_short_time, Time, Result})
 1647: 	    end;
 1648: 	{Time, Result} when Time > Upper ->
 1649: 	    ct:fail({too_long_time, Time, Result});
 1650: 	{_, {error, timeout}} ->
 1651: 	    ok;
 1652: 	{_, Result} ->
 1653: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_result, Result})
 1654:     end.
 1655: 
 1656: %% Try to obtain an unused IP address in the local network.
 1657: 
 1658: unused_ip() ->
 1659:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1660:     {ok, Hent} = inet:gethostbyname(Host),
 1661:     #hostent{h_addr_list=[{A, B, C, _D}|_]} = Hent,
 1662:     %% Note: In our net, addresses below 16 are reserved for routers and
 1663:     %% other strange creatures.
 1664:     IP = unused_ip(A, B, C, 16),
 1665:     if
 1666:         (IP =:= error) ->
 1667:             %% This is not supported on all platforms (yet), so...
 1668:             try net:getifaddrs() of
 1669:                 {ok, IfAddrs} ->
 1670:                     ?P("~n   we        = ~p"
 1671:                        "~n   unused_ip = ~p"
 1672:                        "~n   ~p", [Hent, IP, IfAddrs]);
 1673:                 {error, _} ->
 1674:                     ?P("~n   we:        ~p"
 1675:                        "~n   unused_ip: ~p", [Hent, IP])
 1676:             catch
 1677:                 _:_:_ ->
 1678:                     ?P("~n   we:        ~p"
 1679:                        "~n   unused_ip: ~p", [Hent, IP])
 1680:             end;
 1681:         true ->
 1682:             ?P("~n   we:        ~p"
 1683:                "~n   unused_ip: ~p", [Hent, IP])
 1684:     end,
 1685:     IP.
 1686: 
 1687: unused_ip(255, 255, 255, 255) -> error;
 1688: unused_ip(255, B, C, D) -> unused_ip(1, B + 1, C, D);
 1689: unused_ip(A, 255, C, D) -> unused_ip(A, 1, C + 1, D);
 1690: unused_ip(A, B, 255, D) -> unused_ip(A, B, 1, D + 1);
 1691: unused_ip(A, B, C, D) ->
 1692:     case inet:gethostbyaddr({A, B, C, D}) of
 1693: 	{ok, _} -> unused_ip(A + 1, B, C, D);
 1694: 	{error, _} -> {ok, {A, B, C, D}}
 1695:     end.
 1696: 
 1697: ok({ok,V}) -> V;
 1698: ok(NotOk) ->
 1699:     try throw(not_ok)
 1700:     catch
 1701: 	throw:Thrown:Stacktrace ->
 1702: 	    erlang:raise(
 1703: 	      error, {Thrown, NotOk}, tl(Stacktrace))
 1704:     end.
 1705: 
 1706: get_localaddr() ->
 1707:     get_localaddr(["localhost", "localhost6", "ip6-localhost"]).
 1708: 
 1709: get_localaddr([]) ->
 1710:     {error, localaddr_not_found};
 1711: get_localaddr([Localhost|Ls]) ->
 1712:     case inet:getaddr(Localhost, inet6) of
 1713:        {ok, LocalAddr} ->
 1714:            ?P("~s ~p", [Localhost, LocalAddr]),
 1715:            {ok, LocalAddr};
 1716:        _ ->
 1717:            get_localaddr(Ls)
 1718:     end.
 1719: 
 1720: getsockfd() -> undefined.
 1721: closesockfd(_FD) -> undefined.
 1722: 
 1723: -define(WIN32_LOCAL_PRE, "").
 1724: -define(UNIX_LOCAL_PRE,  "/tmp/").
 1725:  
 1726: local_filename(Tag) ->
 1727:     {OSF, _} = os:type(),
 1728:     local_filename(OSF, Tag).
 1729: 
 1730: local_filename(win32, Tag) ->
 1731:     local_filename(?WIN32_LOCAL_PRE, ".sock", Tag);
 1732: local_filename(_, Tag) ->
 1733:     local_filename(?UNIX_LOCAL_PRE, "", Tag).
 1734: 
 1735: local_filename(Pre, Post, Tag) ->
 1736:     ?F("~s~s_~s_~w_~w~s",
 1737:        [Pre,
 1738: 	?MODULE_STRING,os:getpid(),erlang:system_time(millisecond),Tag,
 1739: 	Post]).
 1740:     %% Pre ++
 1741:     %% 	?MODULE_STRING "_" ++ os:getpid() ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Tag) ++
 1742:     %% 	Post.
 1743: 
 1744: bin_filename(String) ->
 1745:     unicode:characters_to_binary(String, file:native_name_encoding()).
 1746: 
 1747: delete_local_filenames() ->
 1748:     {OSF, _} = os:type(),
 1749:     delete_local_filenames(OSF).
 1750: 
 1751: delete_local_filenames(win32) ->
 1752:     do_delete_local_filenames(?WIN32_LOCAL_PRE);
 1753: delete_local_filenames(_) ->
 1754:     do_delete_local_filenames(?UNIX_LOCAL_PRE).
 1755: 
 1756: do_delete_local_filenames(Pre) ->
 1757:     _ =
 1758: 	[file:delete(F) ||
 1759: 	    F <-
 1760: 		filelib:wildcard(
 1761: 		  Pre ++ ?MODULE_STRING "_" ++ os:getpid() ++ "_*")],
 1762:     ok.
 1763: 
 1764: 
 1765: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1766: 
 1767: is_not_windows() ->
 1768:     case os:type() of
 1769:         {win32, nt} ->
 1770:             skip("This does not work on Windows");
 1771:         _ ->
 1772:             ok
 1773:     end.
 1774: 
 1775: is_net_supported() ->
 1776:     try net:info() of
 1777:         #{} ->
 1778:             ok
 1779:     catch
 1780:         error : notsup ->
 1781:             not_supported(net)
 1782:     end.
 1783: 
 1784: 
 1785: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1786: 
 1787: not_supported(What) ->
 1788:     skip({not_supported, What}).
 1789: 
 1790: skip(Reason) ->
 1791:     throw({skip, Reason}).
 1792: 
 1793: 
 1794: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1795: 
 1796: pi(Item) ->
 1797:     {Item, Val} = process_info(self(), Item),
 1798:     Val.
 1799:

 1803: connect_failed_str(Reason) ->
 1804:     ?F("Connect failed: ~w", [Reason]).
 1805: 
 1806: listen_failed_str(Reason) ->
 1807:     ?F("Listen failed: ~w", [Reason]).
 1808: 
 1809: accept_failed_str(Reason) ->
 1810:     ?F("Accept failed: ~w", [Reason]).
